website_summaries.verdict: This water bottle comes with a snapped-on bowl that can be attached to the bottle for water on the go.
pros: Water bottle is sturdy, works well and does not cost a lot of money
Designed to hang easily from your backpack or bag
Enough water for dogs under about 60 pounds
You can squeeze out the exact amount your dog needs
cons: You will have to keep your hand on the bottle while your pet drinks or it will likely fall over and spill your water

customer_reviews.title: Convenient
customer_reviews.text: I brought a product before. It’s was made from silicone gel, every time I need to bring that and a bottle of water, very inconvenient. This product likes 2-in-1 for me. The bottle is light, easy to carry and use. It can provide my pet with plenty of clean water.
customer_reviews.author: Sieghild

customer_reviews.title: Easy to carry on and good design
customer_reviews.text: My cat likes this water bottle. It’s easy to carry outside of home. Not too much volume of water is just the right size for small animals like puppies and cats. It has a tank on it and you can easily squeeze water into the tank for your cats/dogs to drink at any time. I used it for camping with my cat for a while day, and he drank about 80% of the water by the end of the day.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Z

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: It was hard for my puppy to drink water from a general waterbottle so I got this one. Liked its color and design. My dog seems to like it too.
customer_reviews.author: Hhh

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: It's ok. Does it hold water? Yes, it does. I've owned similar water bottles and I found this one just ok. We would have to squeeze the bottle to get the water out and the suction would just draw the water back up. The bottle often fell on our dogs snout while they were drinking and it just scared them off. We eventually just took the bottle off and poured it in the dish. With that said it was still useful just not the way it was designed to be.
customer_reviews.author: TML

customer_reviews.title: It seems like the cheapest plastic imaginable
customer_reviews.text: Am I missing something, here? I see that they say it's BPA free, but what else would indicate that it's food grade plastic? It seems like the cheapest plastic imaginable, the really smelly cheap stuff, and it has no recycling symbol on it. I wouldn't drink out if it and my dog won't either.
customer_reviews.author: Lenny

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my needs, some minor issues.
customer_reviews.text: I like how I can cary it anywhere. I'm usually traveling a lot. It does need to stay upright it can leak a bit being shook around on the side (if traveling). I mainly wanted it so I don't have to hunt for something to put water in, It's all in one. If you want it to stay upright on its own with out it tipping over(it does stay up on its own but could use more stability) I recommend using a rubber band like I did. Wrapping it. This design allowds for that with the extended front, quality looks much better than the others I've searched. Think it's the best I've found.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Not very easy to use wastes water
customer_reviews.text: This bottle is nice, I bought it because it was pretty and looked like it would meet my needs. The lid is not easy to screw back on when full, I spill a lot of water trying to twist the lid/drink tray back on, when I pour water into the tray for my dog to drink if she doesn't drink it all I have to waste it and pour out what's in the tray, it is too small for a long trip, it leaks, and it does not sit up in my cupholder properly. Nice try but not impressed, I went back to the one I bought for my brother's dog a few years ago much better design.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa R

customer_reviews.title: Does not stand open by itself without "help"...
customer_reviews.text: Initial run through was okay, but when opening it up and trying to leave the bottle in the UP position, it would not stay up. It kept falling into the bowl unless the bowl had a shim under it or it was on an incline downhill to the upright bottle end. Ended up looping a rubber band around the neck of the bottle and through the "paw-print" hole at the end to keep the bottle upright while open. Ridiculous that I would have to do this, but passing this on as a gift with the modification. Do not recommend...
customer_reviews.author: WILLIAM D.

customer_reviews.title: Almost Great
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice size bottle while walking our small dog (17lbs). We do not need a lot of water so the size is great. There are two small issues: 1. Even though the description clearly says it won't stand on its own this is more annoying than you would guess. 2. When the bottle is squeezed to let water out (it is great that it does not leak), when the bottle is released it will suck the water back into the bottle unless it is angled away from the spout (a small annoyance). In any event, the bottle looks great is a good quality.
customer_reviews.author: D. Porrey

customer_reviews.title: It’s for puppies
customer_reviews.text: This drinking bottle for dogs is particularly nice and cute, just like the picture. It is bone-like, so cute, I feel like my baby likes it very much , and also it looks like a bone toys for him. This water cup is also very convenient to use, especially easy to carry, and it is very convenient to take it with you whenever you go out to walk your dog. But the capacity of this water cup is not much, so I think it may not be enough for larger dogs, so it is recommended for puppies.
customer_reviews.author: mercyprayer

customer_reviews.title: Good for small dogs
customer_reviews.text: I think this is a really cool product and I did not have any issues with the quality or functionality--this is why it is getting 5 stars. I do not think this is a good product for dogs that are bigger than 20 or so pounds. This is basically one drink for my 50 lb dog. Wish it came in bigger sizes!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Lindberg

customer_reviews.title: It's better than some, okay at the price.
customer_reviews.text: It would be great if you could open it and set it on the ground with the bottle vertical. Unfortunately if you set it down you have to hold the bottle up so the dog can drink. It takes quite a few squeezes to get an appreciable amount of water out, and it doesn't hold all that much. On the plus side, it's not very heavy when full and you don't have to worry about glass breakage if you drop it. The dog also rates it a 3, meaning he'll drink out of it maybe 3 walks out of 5.
customer_reviews.author: GeezerGeek

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money if you have a dog more than 10 punds.
customer_reviews.text: Bottle holds 12 ounces of water. For my 50 pound dog, that is one drinking session barely. If you walk in hot weather for more than a mile, dog needs 3 times that much water. Maybe my fault when when I read description. I interpreted that it would be a larger bottle. Since the cost was small, I would not send back and give it to someone who has a toy poodle or such small size dog.
customer_reviews.author: Vince

customer_reviews.title: Very handy for travel
customer_reviews.text: Used this for the first time at a weekend event. Works great and compact - no need to carry a bowl, very handy for travel. A great little drinking bottle and bowl for your dog to drink from while on a walk. Great for a hike, a long stroll, car rides that need a water break, or even outside by the pool. Great price. Get one!
customer_reviews.author: WILLOW YANG

customer_reviews.title: Ingenious
customer_reviews.text: Amazing how the little things can make your life easier. This bottle is easy to fill and screws easily into the holder. Once you slide it into the holder, you are good to go. To dispense you simply tilt the bottle up and squeeze the amount of desired water into the little dispenser, dump what wasn't used, and close it back up. I take my dog to the park three times a week and this comes with us every time. It has a wrist strap for ease of carrying or you can put it in your backpack without worrying about leakage. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Handy water dispenser unit
customer_reviews.text: Nice keeping water bottle especially for the price. This does struggle to stand upright on solid ground due to a heavy bottle(when full) but usually we can find a slope so it can stand. The noise it makes while dispensing water was a little much for our timid dog but over time we think she will get used to this. We do enjoy it’s compact design. It is a nice dispenser overall.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Great but my puppy was uninterested
customer_reviews.text: This is great! Unfortunately my puppy only likes to chew on it and not drink from it. I do wish there was an easier way to get the water back into the bottle, without unscrewing it. Also, if you keep it in a bag while you are walking around..it does leak a little. I think it would be a great option if my puppy wasn’t more interested in chewing the plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: perfect for short walks
customer_reviews.text: This bottle is really good for short walks. Does not hold a lot of water. Also better for smaller dogs. If your dog has a larger snout they could have difficulty drinking from it since it's not very wide. I love that it doesn't leak.
customer_reviews.author: katydidnt_doit

customer_reviews.title: Actually Works!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried several models and they all leak. This one actually opens when you tip it up and closes when you put it back. Of course store it in the upright position. I am looking for a bigger size of the same brand for when my puppy grows up.
customer_reviews.author: JVC

customer_reviews.title: The bottle will not stand up
customer_reviews.text: I have a Service Dog and he needed a water bowl we could take with us on our training walks. I liked the fact it had a tray but the bottle will not stand up on its own. It’s fallen on top of my dogs face. Which scared him terribly. Then if he doesn’t drink all of the water in the tray I’m stuck with where I can dump it out at. I have to bend down on the ground so he can reach it.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy Gornak

customer_reviews.title: Convenient, but tiny for the size I choose
customer_reviews.text: It’s a convenient carrying water bottle with the carabiner include. Easy for the pup to sip from and minimize spillage. Nice for short walks, but not good enough for long hikes (which was my original reason for purchasing). The bottle is too tiny for the trails, unless you refill it after every few sips.
customer_reviews.author: Lenin

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I wish I would’ve read the part where it says doesn’t stay up on it on before I purchased it. But that turned out not to be a big deal I just unscrew the bottle and leave it on the ground for my dog. The reason why am giving it a four star review, is when I opened the box, it had a very strong plastic scent to it and I was apprehensive about using it, but after two washings it was gone and all seems good.
customer_reviews.author: BrooklynGal

customer_reviews.title: Perfect bottle for a small dog
customer_reviews.text: Great little bottle for a dog for walks and traveling. Easy to just squeeze out water for pup. Comes apart for easy cleaning I dont think this would be great for a big dog, as it doesnt hold much water
customer_reviews.author: Danika Almeida

customer_reviews.title: A hydrated pup is a happy pup
customer_reviews.text: For the love of your dog...get them this water bottle! It's a convenient size, comes with a carrying handle, and doesn't leak. Easy to fill and easy to use. So many less dogs would need rescuing in the summer heat if people carried water for their dogs. Now you can be one of those good pet owners.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Yay for the bottle!
customer_reviews.text: i like this bottle, always wanted a drinking bottle for my baby. I have a large dog it would take about two times for him to drink this whole bottle. For cleaning I would put some soap mix with water and just rinse it off( didn’t want bacterials to build up) 🙄 I have a flat tire in the middle of the highway. Thanks to the kindest people in downtown who save my day! Just happened while I’m writing this review.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy

customer_reviews.title: I like the shape and the color of the bottle
customer_reviews.text: This is not just for the dog, I bought it for my cat. It works well so far. I like the shape and the color of the bottle. It makes for travel so it's not easy to stand on the ground. I hold it to feed my cat. I was worried that the water will split out. But it is not because I need to squeeze the bottle. It's lightweight and easy to carry for traveling.
customer_reviews.author: Doris Meng

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: Work ok I just wish there was a way to out the water not used back in the bottle so I don't have to waste it. Also I had trouble getting the bottle to stay up on its own.
customer_reviews.author: Jackee J

customer_reviews.title: Works Very Well for My Small Dog
customer_reviews.text: This size water bottle works perfectly for my small dog (13 pounds). We usually walk 2 to 3 miles every morning and now that it's getting a little warmer I take this water bottle along. He drinks out of it easily and it's easy to carry and not too heavy. He usually doesn't drink all of the water so I think it's the perfect size for him.
customer_reviews.author: Volunteer

customer_reviews.title: Too small for my purpose
customer_reviews.text: The part where this product falls short is the size. I bought this for hiking and even a short 1.5-hour hike my dog has already emptied it. It's great for shorter trips and road trips. Just plan to refill it. It doesn't leak. It definitely feels cheap, but then again it is cheap. It does exactly what its supposed to do.
customer_reviews.author: TVahle

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for us
customer_reviews.text: My dog wouldn't drink out of it but maybe he is just fussy. Also it leaks a bit. I like the concept but found it didn't work well. I gave it away.
customer_reviews.author: Martha

customer_reviews.title: Top heavy, but convenient
customer_reviews.text: I found this water bottle to be really convenient to carry around and for my dog to drink out of. I didn't have any issues with it leaking or anything. It is kinda top heavy, so if you try to put it down on anything but a flat surface it will fall over.
customer_reviews.author: Beautyq25

customer_reviews.title: Great idea but jury still out for small dogs
customer_reviews.text: Great idea however water or moisture is always in drinking area unless u dry it or something to not let droplets get on anything it is near My puppy is 4lbs and had trouble with depth of area to drink from she won’t be much bigger so hope she gets used to it Overall I think overpriced for what it is and quality
customer_reviews.author: Happy mom

customer_reviews.title: Doggy water bottle
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly to have water available for my dog. The only improvement I could suggest is that I wish there was a smaller size option for little dogs. This one is smaller than many, but smaller still would work for me.
customer_reviews.author: PK

customer_reviews.title: Must have for dog walks
customer_reviews.text: I love this dog water bottle. It fits in standard bottle holders, it's easy for the dogs to drink out of and also easy to clean. Been stopped by many people asking where I got it. Now my dogs are always hydrated, especially when it's warm outside
customer_reviews.author: magnolia

customer_reviews.title: Water Trough
customer_reviews.text: I used it as a water trough for quails. Like: as described, easy to dissemble and clean. I needed something that provide water and avoid quails contaminating the water reservoir. This got the job done. Dislike: the water capacity may not be enough once I have more quail. As this is more for traveling use rather than long term use. Overall, I have a good experience with this product
customer_reviews.author: HAO

customer_reviews.title: My second one. First one broke when I dropped ...
customer_reviews.text: My second one. First one broke when I dropped it but it lasted quit a while and has just the right amount of water for my cocker spaniel. One thing, the connector will eventually break if you let it swing to much so it will last longer if you put it in your pocket or just hold on to it.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Good design
customer_reviews.text: I like this travel water bottle, it folds up small so is convenient for traveling, but also seems easy for dog to drink from. Some of these travel bottles have pet drinking out of a small scoop area while you hold it & my cat would probably not be willing to drink so close to my hand, so I think this bottle is better design as area for drinking is larger; we’ll see when we take him on trip.
customer_reviews.author: Lulu yu

customer_reviews.title: Convenient and simple water bowl for your furry friend!
customer_reviews.text: This water bottle is easy to carry around and to squeeze water into the carrying bowl, even when walking. I have a big dog and even though this looks small, it holds enough water for our daily walk. The only thing that's a bit awkward, is having to twist the water bottle into the bowl as the cap is stationary and you need to turn the bottle. Otherwise, great product!
customer_reviews.author: E. Yuter

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy!!
customer_reviews.text: We’ve had this bottle for about a year now and it’s been great. Good quality...easy to use...our dog loves it. Great for walks or traveling!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Not sure what all you can say about a simple water bottle. This works great, is easy to use and learn, and my pup loves to drink out of it on our long walks. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Mat

customer_reviews.title: Handy for a smaller dog.
customer_reviews.text: I love this item. I wish the water bottle was a little bit bigger, and that it stood up a bit better (water bottle gets top heavy and tips over), but it’s eash to hold on to. I didn’t notice too much leaking and I got a lot of compliments on it.
customer_reviews.author: Aubrey Rinella

customer_reviews.title: This Bottle Brings all the Pups to the Yard
customer_reviews.text: If you want to be the most popular person at the dog park when the existing water fountain doesn't work or is constantly peed on, this water bottle is for you! Great little combined bottle and water dish, no leakage, and keeps the pup well-hydrated. Does what it's supposed to do, so can't ask for much more than that!
customer_reviews.author: Micah W.

customer_reviews.title: it's pretty small, but the strap makes it easy to ...
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves this water bottle!! it's pretty small, but the strap makes it easy to carry and my dog absolutely loves using it. I have to hold it for her, it doesn't stand upright on it's own. It holds enough water to get us through a walk on a hot day.
customer_reviews.author: Shauna

customer_reviews.title: LOVELY AND  CONIVENIENT
customer_reviews.text: It's a quite lovely and convenient bottle!Water bowl is attached. Easily disassemble for cleaning. With the lovely bone and dog claw pattern, simple design, and easy-carried lanyard, this bottle can go wherever you and your pup love to go!
customer_reviews.author: LBJ panda

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: This is the best thing ever! My mom and I both have one. Its great when walking the dogs or traveling. Fits perfectly in a cup holder. Just squeeze and hold while your pup drinks and then let go and water goes back into the bottle. No spills! No mess!
customer_reviews.author: Leo Chou

customer_reviews.title: Great solution!
customer_reviews.text: We pack this up anytime we take our pups anywhere! It goes in our bag and has never leaked or had issues! Have recommended it to a couple people who liked it.
customer_reviews.author: Justin L.

customer_reviews.title: Ok, but it leaks
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for us while we travel with 3 dogs however it is NOT leak proof. Not sure if I got a broken one or what but it definitely leaks.
customer_reviews.author: Ian White

customer_reviews.title: My dog's thirst is quenched on hot days.
customer_reviews.text: There was no training required. I keep the bottle full in the fridge and take it out for our walks. He may drink a third to a half of it on a half-hour walk. You might want a larger capacity bottle if you are going on a much longer excursion. But then, this does not weigh you down. It's perfect for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t lock into place
customer_reviews.text: It served its purpose. I wanted it for flying with a puppy so he could have a drink during our layover. But I had to hold the bottle or the slightest bump it would fall back into the cup. It’s easier to just take the bottle off.
customer_reviews.author: MaTaylor67

customer_reviews.title: Good Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Kind of hard to squeeze the water out, but good price and worth the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Minnis

customer_reviews.title: Just what we were looking for.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what we were looking for! Super easy to use and perfect for our trips with the dog.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Allshouse

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: I really love this product! It's easy to use and I haven't had any problems squeezing there bottle or any issues with spilling. My dog is able to easily drink from this when we go on walks, etc. I would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Tenacious

customer_reviews.title: My puppy like it
customer_reviews.text: i got a golden retriever puppy and he need a lot of water every day. So every time we take him for a walk we need to take some water. We used to take a plastic ball and a bottle. But this one is much more easier!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Got this in case we had to leave home for the hurricane that was coming to Virginia. It works well. I will be ready for any weather problems.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Sanford

customer_reviews.title: Little Cute water bottle
customer_reviews.text: Very cute little bottle for my babies. I have a medium size husky, and it’s definitely hold enough water for her when we go out for hiking or a walk. It has acceptable price and cute looki
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Just what I  need for my dog.
customer_reviews.text: Just what i needed! It's not to big and bulky and it's not to small. It holds just enough water for us to go on our hikes. My dog is so happy to have his own bowl with water.
customer_reviews.author: May

customer_reviews.title: It is convenience
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 bottle for dog already, but they are inconvenience, but this bottle does it all, i can put it on the floor, than my dog drink it. Take it everytime when i walk my dog now.
customer_reviews.author: Kyl

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: The concept is great however this does not hold enough water and it started to leak
customer_reviews.author: bbcombo

customer_reviews.title: This water bottle is a poor design and it is too small
customer_reviews.text: This water bottle is a poor design and it is too small. It comes apart too easily when filling the tray. It does not have a clip to put on a belt. The strap is useless. I ordered the 20 oz. Gulpy instead.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves this travel bottle
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves drinking water from this bottle. It’s very easy to carry when I walk her. I just press the bottle and the water will come out easily. It’s sturdy plastic which is good quality. Highly recommended! Great way to make my dog to drink more water.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Emphasis on small aminals
customer_reviews.text: This bottle would probably be good for a chihuahua owner. It's very small, so it holds very little water.
customer_reviews.author: Linda J. Konrad

customer_reviews.title: Dog kettle
customer_reviews.text: Give me a new adopted dog, it likes it, apply it to come and drink water immediately, all the water in a bottle is finished, and the dog can drink water at any time.
customer_reviews.author: Fang Li

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than expected
customer_reviews.text: Its decent. Leaks a little. You can't really use it as a bowl (squeezing water out then placing it on ground) It tips over easily if you do. I have a 57 pound pitbull and this is Just small. But it does travel well for that reason.
customer_reviews.author: Myah

customer_reviews.title: Won’t leak.
customer_reviews.text: This is great for trips with my dog. My only complaint is that I can’t get it to stand up which means I must hold it for my dog to drink. It has never leaked though!
customer_reviews.author: Mama

customer_reviews.title: Its not hands free but it works
customer_reviews.text: I liked that the bottle closed into the trough but when opened to dispense water the bottle doesn't stand up so I have to hold it while the dog drinks. It's not hands free
customer_reviews.author: Susan Clement

customer_reviews.title: 100% recomendation
customer_reviews.text: love it and it is super practical if you are the kind of person that like to travel with your dog and going to parks and walks I recomended 100% this size is small but they also sell a bigger one in case you have a bigger dog
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ALMOST THERE.
customer_reviews.text: Pet doesn't like drinking out of small cup part. Great to carry water.
customer_reviews.author: S. Hartman

customer_reviews.title: Plastic STANK
customer_reviews.text: Love this bottle except for two things: A) It's a little hard to screw the bottle back in after filling, and B) It came with a ridiculously strong plastic smell. I soaked it in baking soda, soap, and warm water repeatedly and it faded a lot, but it was a very intense odor out of the box. Otherwise it's a nice bottle--good size and super useful.
customer_reviews.author: L. Reinhardt

customer_reviews.title: convenient
customer_reviews.text: This pet water bottle is easy to use and the size is just fit in my big handbag. Our dog can easily drink water from it when we hang out. Recommend!
customer_reviews.author: aboluo

customer_reviews.title: Easy to carry and use
customer_reviews.text: Light weight. Portable. Easy to carry. I like how it has a lanyard and I could just carry the bottle on my wrist. Just like a regular water bottle. Easy to fill up the bottle and clean as well.
customer_reviews.author: laura

customer_reviews.title: Cute little water bottle for pet
customer_reviews.text: pretty cute little water bottle. East to carry without leaking. It feed ok for my little dog and middle size dog.I don’t think this bottle will work for big Dog. Also I feel this bottle is price too high.
customer_reviews.author: lisa

customer_reviews.title: It's ok, but not great.
customer_reviews.text: It's ok. It works for an hour walk, but not enough liquid for longer with a 70 pound pup. It also leaks moderately, so not great to just throw in a bag and go.
customer_reviews.author: Miranda

customer_reviews.title: For small dogs!
customer_reviews.text: Leaked. Too flimsy for a larger dog. Otherwise worked fine.
customer_reviews.author: Gerry

customer_reviews.title: My Lab needs a bigger bottle
customer_reviews.text: This is just what I ordered and it fits nicely in my fanny pack. But it's a little to small for my thirsty lab.
customer_reviews.author: Dinny Cosyns

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Easily transportable, however, the bottle does not always stay up when my dog drinks from it. The less water in the bottle, the less likely it is to stay upright. Annoying especially on those hot days.
customer_reviews.author: Pleasantville Mom

customer_reviews.title: Really Small
customer_reviews.text: This is too small for my needs. I’m going to use it occasionally, but really was looking for something that would hold more water.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not stable
customer_reviews.text: Bottle falls over into the tray and tips over when you set it on the ground. It only works if I hold it. Very annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Kathi Brewer

customer_reviews.title: If you have a flat faced dog like a english bulldog this simply does not work because ...
customer_reviews.text: If you have a flat faced dog like a english bulldog this simply does not work because they cant get their face down in it and they have smaller tongues. Maybe a long nose dog.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy Pandy

customer_reviews.title: Pet Water for Travel
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to fill and clean. No leaks and handy carrying strap for dog walks!
customer_reviews.author: Misty Taphorn

customer_reviews.title: Great for a small dog
customer_reviews.text: The picture looked like a big dog was drinking from it. This would be a great product for a small pet, but I wouldn’t recommend it for a large bread
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Michel

customer_reviews.title: Great design
customer_reviews.text: Great design and quality. Easy to carry! Bottom volume is enough for my golden big boy!
customer_reviews.author: tammy

customer_reviews.title: works fine, but would be better for small dog than my large one.
customer_reviews.text: easy to carry. based on directions I dump unused water out and let air dry between uses. Not sure what regulations are in place with products used with pets - probably very few
customer_reviews.author: Laurie P.

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok but not really worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Great for walks. The only thing I didn’t like was ire bottle would fall down in the drinking tray and scare our dog.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen Maitino

customer_reviews.title: Too small for large dog
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a water bottle for my dog. She is a large dog and it is too small for her needs. I have another bottle which I used in addition to it
customer_reviews.author: rose

customer_reviews.title: It was exactly what it looked like in the pic
customer_reviews.text: Just needs to be bigger. Not enough water for a short walk on a hot day
customer_reviews.author: Karen Bates

customer_reviews.title: great!!!
customer_reviews.text: This product is great. It is very convenient to go out and carry. Just gently open it. Puppy or kitten can easily drink water. A friend who has a pet at home can buy one for use.

customer_reviews.title: Very handy
customer_reviews.text: Now my little guy has water when we are out. It is so handy, I keep one in the car with me. Never have to worry about him trying to get a drink

customer_reviews.title: Great dog water bottle!
customer_reviews.text: I love this water bottle! The trough makes it easy for my dog to drink water and the compact size is perfect for hikes. It’s easy to dispense and the material is durable as well.

customer_reviews.title: Finally!!
customer_reviews.text: Best PURCHASE ever! We've bought 3 other types.... And wasted our money. Doesn't leak! Fits in car cup holder! Perfect for our Shih Tzu.

customer_reviews.title: ANPETBEST Dog Water Bottle 325ML
customer_reviews.text: Work great, especially when traveling with a pet,and easily to carry. My pup really enjoys using it.

customer_reviews.title: It is flimsy.
customer_reviews.text: It leaks if you don't sit it right. My dog would not have anything to do with it.
customer_reviews.author: Jojo

customer_reviews.title: Be careful when screwing the bottle into the holder.
customer_reviews.text: Started out great, good sized bottle and I like the little rope handle attached for carrying. Unfortunately after one month the top part that you screw the bottle into broke while I was hurrying to load it. That being said, I ordered another one and plan to treat it more gently.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for my french bulldog who is 4.5 years old and picky everything , but he loves his water bottle. He is always in need of a drink when we hiking, walking around or having a overnight trip. It's very convenient to use and not big and bulky. This bottle water also has a wrist band that you can attach that make is easy to take it. Good prise. You better have one.
customer_reviews.author: Roxie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My little doggy like this a lot. Very convenient. Very useful. Easy to carry. I am very satisfied.

customer_reviews.title: I love this bottle
customer_reviews.text: I love this bottle. Every time we take our puppy out, we make sure we have this bottle with us. My puppy is still getting used to drinking water out of it.

customer_reviews.text: This bottle is the perfect size for carrying while on a walk with my dog. It’s does not leak and is easy to use. Dog has no trouble drinking the water from it.

customer_reviews.text: My golden retriever LOVES this. I fill it with cold water (refrigerated) before we go on our walks, and he uses it everyday.
customer_reviews.author: Luna Xenia

customer_reviews.title: Great Design, Convenient Way to Deliver Water to Your Thirsty Pet
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight, convenient way to carry and deliver water to your adored pet on a walk, hike, or trip. I bought two, one for each car. My one wish is that it was a bit larger.

product_meta.title: ANPETBEST Travel Water Bottle 325ML /11oz Water Dispenser Portable Mug for Dogs,Cats and Other Small Animals
feature_bullets: 2. BPA free, Not only to dogs, but also for small animals such as cats and rabbits.
3. Water bottle with attached water bowl,Position upright to fill bowl, Easily disassemble for cleaning.

4. Instructions: Remove the bottle from the holder and snap it into the upright position. Squeeze the bottle gently to start water flow. Place the bowl on the ground(Bottle Will not Stay Upright Itself, You May Need to Hold It in order to Avoid Falling Down and Hit Your Pet on The Head) or hold it in your hand and allow your dog to drink.

5. With the lovely bone and dog claw pattern, simple design, and easy-carried lanyard, this bottle can go wherever you and your pup love to go! such as taking your pet for a hike, run or overnight trip. The water and bowl in this all-in-one, lightweight, leak-proof water bottle and dispenser is your good choice.
